channel.title: Server Broken? or it just the client?
channel.description:
basically, im trying to get others to connect to my server, and it isn't working out to well...
i downloaded boxingscape, great 317 source with 508 models made by nixxx, and i went into GUI and changed the ip to my server's ip. honestly all i did was kinda rename the folder and such and zipped it up and uploaded to filefront. But, players for some reason still cannot connect. In the command prompt it says:
Client handler: Client Null disconnect (their IP here)
How do i fix this? i know it something i did wrong with the client, and ive looked around for 3+ hours, and just can't seem to find anything... By the way...i can connect using the boxingscape client that came with source, but it says my ip is 127.0.0.1
msn is lukedawesome@hotmail.com (if you really feel like helping)
thanks
